code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const JobsList=_ref=>{let{jobsState}=_ref;const[openDropdownId,setOpenDropdownId]=useState(null);const[dropdownCoords,setDropdownCoords]=useState({top:0,left:0});const toggleDropdown=(e,jobId)=>{e.stopPropagation();console.log('toggleDropdown called for jobId:',jobId);const rect=e.currentTarget.getBoundingClientRect();console.log('dropdown coords:',rect.bottom,rect.left);if(openDropdownId===jobId){setOpenDropdownId(null);return;}setDropdownCoords({top:rect.bottom,left:rect.left});setOpenDropdownId(jobId);};useEffect(()=>{const handleClickOutside=()=>{setOpenDropdownId(null);};window.addEventListener('click',handleClickOutside);return()=>window.removeEventListener('click',handleClickOutside);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:10},children:["Open Dropdown ID: ",openDropdownId||'none']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:jobsState.map(job=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:job.company}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:e=>toggleDropdown(e,job.id),children:"Actions \u25BC"}),openDropdownId===job.id&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{position:'fixed',top:dropdownCoords.top,left:dropdownCoords.left,backgroundColor:'white',border:'1px solid black',padding:8,zIndex:9999},onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:["Dropdown content for ",job.company]})]})]},job.id))})})]});};export default JobsList;
